A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought it was the best of the series since \"Empire\".  I believe a lot of persons who are giving this less than stellar reviews are wanting less existentialism and more \"Let's blow $&(@ up.\"  The sorts of people who will find themselves \"bored\"  regarding this film are going to be your less educated types who want \"Rock-'em\, Sock-'em Robots\" as a feature film.  Sorry\, it doesn't work that way.  IMO\, the equal of \"Empire\" or just slightly below it.  Simply in numerical order\, Episodes IV\, V and VIII are the cream of the franchise.
